Deficiency Narrative: The unauthorized absence debriefing form did not have a section for the child's condition.
Correction Narrative: This information has been added to the debriefing form. See document library.

Deficiency Narrative: The debriefing form is missing a section for asking a child where he was, with whom, where they went, etc.
Correction Narrative: This information has been added to the debriefing form - see document library.

Deficiency Narrative: One staff member's file had no proof of high school diploma or GED.
Correction Narrative: The staff high school diploma was obtained as soon as possible and placed in her binder. Moving forward all direct care staff's high school diploma or GED will be in their respective binders upon hired. The LCCA and Program director will ensure that this is accomplished.

Deficiency Narrative: One of the four employee files read had an incomplete pre-employment affidavit.
Correction Narrative: This deficiency has been corrected. Going forward the LCCA will ensure that all forms including the pre-employment applications are filled out completely and correctly.

Deficiency Narrative: Four of the four records contained CPI, TBRI, and CPR certificates with the operation's name misspelled.
Correction Narrative: The misspelled operation name has been corrected on all four of the CPI,TBRI AND CPR certificates. However, attached is the evidence to show that the correct operation's name was sent to the instructor. The LCCA and program director will ensure that true, accurate and complete records are maintained.
